page.title: 10Families - Michael
page.content: My name is Michael Welby and I am 8 years old. I live in Narrow Way in a new house. I have 4 brothers and sisters, 2 of each. They fight a lot. My Dad works on an oil rig in the North Sea, he is an engineer. Dad flies from Norwich to Aberdeen, and then to the rig by helicopter. We like living in Wenhaston because there are lots of things to do and places to go. The school is quite old, but it is nice. I have lots of friends. I used to live in Lowestoft, but I didn't like it. The school was horrid. I like the work here, we use the computers a lot and we go for walks. We have been looking at lots of trees. I like reading and maths, but I don't always like writing.
